titleStmt.title: The policy of princes in subjection to the Son. Explained and applied, in a sermon preached before the Right Honourable the Parliament, in Margarets Westminster, on Wednesday the 24th of Sept. 1656. being the day of their publick fast. / By William Jenkyn pastor of Anne Black-Fryers.
titleStmt.author: Jenkyn, William, 1613-1685.

titleStmt.title: The policy of princes in subjection to the Son. Explained and applied, in a sermon preached before the Right Honourable the Parliament, in Margarets Westminster, on Wednesday the 24th of Sept. 1656. being the day of their publick fast. / By William Jenkyn pastor of Anne Black-Fryers.
titleStmt.author: Jenkyn, William, 1613-1685.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by A.M. for John Dallam, and are to be sold at his shop in Shoomakers-Row in Black-Fryers near Carter-lane.,

notesStmt.note: The first leaf bears the order to print.
A variant of the edition with imprint giving "Samuel Gellebrand" as publisher.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
